Sentencas: This work reports the preparation and properties of the ceramic mixtures of the A-site deficient perovskite Sr0.94Y0.04TiO3 (SYT) with CeO2 in a range of ratios with a view to establishing their potential as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics

Sentencas: Good electrical conductivity that decreased with increasing CeO2 content was observed on reduction in forming gas.
Titulo: Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics

Sentencas: The composition with 50 wt.% of CeO2 Showed the conductivity of 7.0 S/cm at 900 degrees C in forming gas.
Titulo: Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics

Sentencas: The thermal expansion of SYT-CeO2 ceramics in forming gas and in air were investigated in the range 25-900 degrees C at a ramping rate of 3 degrees C/min and thermal expansion coefficients were determined.
Titulo: Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics

Sentencas: The addition of ceria was found to have a positive influence on the catalytic behavior of SYT-CeO2 ceramics towards steam methane reforming.
Titulo: Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics
Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics

Sentencas: Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics
Effect of ceria on properties of yttrium-doped strontium titanate ceramics
